Question.Subject: What are the fonts used in the Carol never wore her goggles poster?
Question.ChosenAnswer:
Aachen Bold. It might be either a standard Windows font or something that comes with common software - I have it on my computer and I certainly didn't put it there on purpose :D
If you need to buy it, it's $36 here http://www.ascenderfonts.com/font/aachen-bold.aspx

Answer.Content:
Aachen Bold. It might be either a standard Windows font or something that comes with common software - I have it on my computer and I certainly didn't put it there on purpose :D

Answer.Reference: it's been around a while - and it's very recognizable
